titles.title: Household Employee Flexible Savings Plan Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include certain safe harbor deferred compensation plans for domestic and similar workers in the waiver of the tax on nondeductible contributions.
Household Employee Flexible Savings Plan Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Household Employee Flexible Savings Plan Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify certain pension plan cash or deferred arrangements for the waiver of the tax on nondeductible contributions to qualified employer plans.
